title: NA server malfunctioning
body: Just started a game, 15 seconds and it froze and kicked me out from the server, saying "attempting to connect". Then says server unavailable. Hope i'm not gonna be placed into lower priority queue for this

replies.body: > On 12/07/16, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (09:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.24. At 03:00 Pacific time (11:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.
Would've been more organised if we'd have been notified on our clients. Beware EU servers, traffic incoming

There's a ticker in the client near the top that alerts you of any messages that were posted to the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) including planned maintenance or live service incidents.

You should consider posting it on your website and forums website as well. It's annoying being unaware because the client wont launch properly, so I have to randomly check every couple of minutes only to be met with disappointment.

> [{quoted}](name=RainsEclipse,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=y7EcePMl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-07T17:38:10.340+0000)
>
> I have continued playing on the old client any everything seems to be working again. Seems like the new client is having problems with the new update.
yeah the server seems to be busy and kicked me out also.
BTW, close and open Lol, because patch 6.2.4 was just released. That might be why there is a problem.
My launch button's grayed out and not working, and above "North America" in the top right, it says "Unavailable" in red.
